reasoning: Spinal osteoarthritis (cervical and lumbar spondylosis) is a chronic degenerative condition best measured by prevalence. Estimated ~6,500 per 100k based on age-adjusted epidemiological studies, with higher rates in older populations.
source: Vos T et al. (2012). Years lived with disability (YLDs) for 1160 sequelae of 289 diseases and injuries 1990â€“2010. Lancet. 380(9859):2163-2196
